# accessoryName

**Instance Property**

The name of the accessory to add.

## Declaration

```swift
var accessoryName: String { get }
```

## Characterizing the Request

- **home**: The home to which to add the accessory.
- **accessoryCategory**: The category of the accessory to add.
- **requiresOwnershipToken**: An indication of whether the add operation requires an ownership token.
- **requiresSetupPayloadURL**: An indication of whether the add operation requires a setup payload URL.
